text: 10.42: Mt 18.5-6; 25.40; Mk 9.41; Hi 6.10Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the kha ndɨkndɨgar muunga, ‘Gu Zisas phorga rui gumgir kurkurarga.’ Ana maaŋ suaŋgip, ana fhura mbɨn ŋamtɨŋ thigen thaman tɨgɨp fhura khar na phorga rui guma o mbiga then nɨɨŋgirga. Gu guigira khar nde nzuai, mba guman vhez fhura mbar ŋgɨgɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mba guma ana won vheza ndigɨrga.”
